total_orders.title: Totale Ordini
total_orders.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM orders WHERE codice_cliente = :client_code

pending_orders.title: Ordini da Evadere
pending_orders.description: Numero di ordini in attesa di evasione
pending_orders.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM orders WHERE codice_cliente = :client_code AND stato IN ('pending', 'processing')

monthly_purchases.title: Acquistato Questo Mese
monthly_purchases.query: SELECT SUM(totale) as value FROM orders WHERE codice_cliente = :client_code AND MONTH(data_ordine) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(data_ordine) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())

total_revenue.title: Fatturato Totale
total_revenue.description: Somma di tutti gli ordini completati
total_revenue.query: SELECT SUM(totale) as value FROM orders WHERE codice_cliente = :client_code AND stato = 'completed'

avg_order_value.title: Valore Medio Ordine
avg_order_value.query: SELECT AVG(totale) as value FROM orders WHERE codice_cliente = :client_code

products_ordered.title: Prodotti Ordinati
products_ordered.query: SELECT SUM(quantita) as value FROM order_items oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id WHERE o.codice_cliente = :client_code
